title: Charting the universe with optical and radio telescopes
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and David Bennett
brief_description: Explains and illustrates instruments and methods used by astronomers. Describes work of radio astronomers and astrophysicists in search of facts about the universe. Shows cooperation between different observatories in solving mysteries of outer space. Suitable for upper secondary level.
